Hi Derek,
>
> We've got almost 400 members now in the group...anybody have any
> experience implementing these things?

Yes, but it was a long, long time ago (circa 2003) and I don't think I
could find the sources now. I do remember it as being quite
straightforward, though, as long as you keep to an object-oriented
approach and don't take too many shortcuts.
